rows.label: tlk42100152_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Ugh, how awful!
I'm all sticky with machine oil!

rows.label: tlk42100152_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Just by squeezing through a small gap in the machinery,
I got covered in oil. Isn't that terrible?

rows.label: tlk42100152_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Now my proud coat is all matted and flat,
and it smells awful!

rows.label: tlk42100152_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Are you worried about me? Thanks!
I'll be fine once I wash it off in the hot spring.

rows.label: tlk42100152_01_msg0005
rows.name:
It's super fun to go for a swim when
there are no people around! This is a secret
from the humans, okay?
